GSD.product_version: versions from v5.4 to before v5.10.78
GSD.description:
mm: khugepaged: skip huge page collapse for special files

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.78 by commit 6d67b2a73b8e3a079c355bab3c1aef7d85a044b8, it was introduced in version v5.4 by commit 99cb0dbd47a15d395bf3faa78dc122bc5efe3fc0. For more details please see the references link.
